title: Dark Candy Fiddlesticks Ult Bug
body: There's been a bug with Dark Candy Fiddlestick's ult for a while now where when he ults it plays the Surprise Party VFX instead of the swirling snow, I don't know how long exactly that this bug has been a thing, but it's happened every time that I've seen the skin.

replies.body:
Hey Ginjor ! 

I believe we spoke on Twitter about this. ^-^ 

I took a look and it appears it's occurring in both enemy view as well as spectator views. We're investigating.
